title: What are basics needed to study to become a hacker? - Quora

response.answer_text: Programming languages: Web-Desing/DevelopingHTML5 (Somewhat Easy)CSS3 (Somewhat Easy)JavaScript (Somewhat Easy – Average)PHP (Somewhat Average – Hard)MySQL (Somewhat Average – Hard)Computer programming: Batch (Easy)C (Average)Python (Easy)Visual Basics (Easy with Visual Studio)Also, a good understanding of networking.

Hacking seems to be a very popular now a days as internet evolves , the tips and tricks Hunters always try to hack something which is precious to them. To Become http://flexitrick.com” a hacker you need to start from scratch it need Patience, Efforts, Strategy, etc. The most technical requirements are Programming languages like C C++ Java, Php, Python, Xml, Html ….so on
